TopicTitle: Help changing command pod in VAB

Articles.Content:
I haven't played since .19 and I read there is new part editor logic that lets you change the first piece. I want to replace a probe core with a command pod. I can delete my probe core but then I can't attach anything to any new command pods I try to place. Is there something I'm missing here?

Edited July 29, 2013 by ModusNex

It should work fine. You just disconnect all the parts you want to keep, then trash the pod. Select a new pod and it appears very low in the VAB and then re-attach everything. Some pics of your problem might help. When you try to add parts to the new pod are you seeing connection nodes?

I got it figured out. When I selected the new pod it was hiding inside my rocket. Moved the rocket out of the way and everything works fine. Thanks!
